actions.name: Blink
actions.description: Effect: The user's attacks that are 60 Power or less gain [Priority 1], or have their [Priority X] increased by 1. An Attack that already has [Priority X] may be used without triggering Interrupts from opponents.

system.description: Effect: The user's attacks that are 60 Power or less gain [Priority 1], or have their [Priority X] increased by 1. An Attack that already has [Priority X] may be used without triggering Interrupts from opponents.
